title: Stages of Bans
body: Question. Do minor suspensions still exist in this game? Or is it just warnings and then a perma ban. I'm just looking for some clarification. Season 4 was when chat bans were handed out. Season 5 was just warnings and then perma bans? Idk just curious... there seems to be a lack of clarity in the banning process in this game.

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Locking this necro.

Punishments are very clear;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

They go in order, it takes 3 months for your punishment tier to drop down one, extremely toxic behavior can result in skipping punishment tiers, and MMR Boosting bans start you right off at a 14 day account ban.

Any questions?

Ok before you read this chat log I warn you it is offensive. 

I have probably received two chat warnings this season and then had a game yesterday where I became very toxic towards a duo. Do you believe this chat log is serious enough to go straight from warning to perma? Idk.

> V1CTIS HONOR: you and %%% jew boy fizz
V1CTIS HONOR: you fucking %%%gots

Yes. Next to death threats, that is some of the worst possible behavior you can exhibit. You earned the permaban, without a doubt. You can easily hit 'Escape' instead of 'Enter' and not send that garbage, and mute them if they are antagonizing you.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=u5FM14IE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-23T08:32:54.837+0000)
>
> V1CTIS HONOR: you fucking %%%gots
> 
> Yes. Next to death threats, that is some of the worst possible behavior you can exhibit. You earned the permaban, without a doubt.

This.

Hate speech escalated your punishment. If you only had 2 chat restrictions before then without those 2 comments you would have gotten a 14 day ban and had another chance before getting permanently banned.
I have an unfortunate vocabulary.

> [{quoted}](name=Vis4Vengeance,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=u5FM14IE,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-23T08:36:51.691+0000)
>
> I have an unfortunate vocabulary.

Its nust just "vocabulary". This is worst possible thing you can do/say in , well anywhere. Expressing antisemitism, homophobia. Its just wrong. Even in RL doing something like this it can get u fired from jobs, even arrested. If you just swear at someone, most u can get is broken nose. But this, what you did, its just sign of failed human being. If you combine Trolling, intentional feeding, simple flaming, helping opponents, leaving, afking, all of that together, it wont even be remotely close to what you did.

Lol.. I love the trolls irl that come to "Player behavior and moderation" and witch hunt and give "advice". I'm sorry life hasn't been fair to you thus far. But I understand whatever makes you feel better friend.

Lol.. want to hear something ironic? I live in boystown Chicago. "Failed human being"... please tell me what makes telling someone this any better than using an old offensive term. It's 2016 grow with the times friend. But, you're from Europe so I wouldn't expect you to understand : D

EDIT: Still waiting on how calling someone a "Failed human being" is any better.

Practice doing the "hit Escape instead of Enter" thing. I do this frequently. People think I act like I'm not affected by the things that set others off, but I very often type something out that could get me punished; I simply erase it instead of sending.
Ha yeah. I had been doing the mute all for a while but unfortunately this started in champ select and I let it carry over into game.
If someone is giving you a hard time in champ select, you can add them to your block list and it will permanently mute them even there.

> [{quoted}](name=Vis4Vengeance,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=u5FM14IE,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-23T08:41:52.223+0000)
>
> Ha yeah. I had been doing the mute all for a while but unfortunately this started in champ select and I let it carry over into game.

I highly recommend dodging when things like that start in champ select. I mean did you enjoy that game at all?

Well I did get to play my favorite matchup. (Riven vs Irelia-I was shitting on the Riven) I muted to start the game then the Lee came to lane and purposely Q'ued my 1 shot from death opponent. (The same person flaming me in champ select) Then it was all down hill from there.
Alright. Fair enough.
You're the worst kind of person to play with :/
Lol.. I assure you I'm better than the person giving up in champ select or after first blood.
No, I'd argue you are worse. In your mind you use these mental gymnastics to try and lessen the effect of your immature and toxic behavior.
Haha whatever you say. I'm sure you have plenty of comments to respond to.
Not really, just the ones I want to drink the tears of. Seeing people getting banned for being assholes really makes me happy to be part of this game.
A loser that makes 6 figures? I don't think so buddy. You know nothing about me.
Same. I guess there is 1 thing we can agree upon. We're two different types of people.
Yea one of us is a civilized hard working COO of a large corporation and the other is a racist homophobe who calls people f*ggots and jews

Yes I am :D 

I get just as much enjoyment firing people as I do reading posts about people getting permad...

Mmm sweet justice.

If you have never had a previous punishment, you may have used zero tolerance words that include hate speech and encouraging suicide. Feel free to create you own post and share the reform card for feedback.

I got a 50 and a 100 game chatban for making weird jokes about tahm kench against French players, I also like to ask people i lane against that have rare skins if their skins have special death animations, they actually find it offensive although I think it's very funny.
riot's ban pyramid is really wrong
Agreed. They don't know wtf they're doing. Every season throwing out some different attempt at how they ban people. Consistently inconsistent.
Yea people like you guys have the right to be assholes to everyone and get away with it. Sound legit.
